Articles.Content: Sometimes, I dream about cheese...

Citizen, pick up that can.

The user below me may or may not quote Half Life.

False, because I have full life.

The user below me is a spider.

Nope, I am a Kerbal

The user below me can't wait for .20

True, who isn't

The user below has exams this week.

False, Kerbals don't even have school

The user below me has crashed Jeb into the vab

True.

The user below me is a hobo.

False

The user below me uses a ton of mods

I use a few, but not many.

The user below me is confused by the stuff going on in the House of Madness.

Nope I think I'm partly orchestrating it

The user below me has an avatar

True. Drew it myself. Pretty, no?

Person below me is French.

True. Mostly because people think their dreamfleets can do anything because they didn't invent the ships or tech themselves and have pop-culture to back them up.

Realistic physics and original designs are superior to the harebrained scheming of forum-goers

[EDIT]: Wow, that was a hell of a snipe. NO. Thankfully I am not French

The user below me is wearing kneebraces(?)

Nope. Don't need any

The user below me is on this forum

True, how did you know?

The user below like space.

False. I like outer space and the cosmos type space but an empty 3 dimensional area is boring.

The user below me is banned from making speeches at his/her school.

false i have only been at my current school for half a year (i move alot) although it is only a matter of time.......

the user below my likes sci-fi books

True. Currently rereading Roadside Picnic by the Strugatsky Brothers.

The user below me has seen the film Stalker.

No I haven't, but I have seen Troll Hunter

The user below me is currently naked.
Nope. The user below me is somewher. SOMEWHERE. SOMEWHERE I TELL YOU SOMEWHERE.

True. I actually am somewhere, shockingly enough. You been spying on me?

Person below me is an enemy infiltrator.

True, I have infiltrated the mainframe and am currently finding your browsing history quite amusing.

The person below me killed Dumbledore

true i didn't like his beard

the person below me is a wizard

False, IT WAS S-*spoilers*-E!

The person below me is Jeb in disguise.

(dang, sniped.)

True, I in fact control all of the magiks.

The person below me is evil

............. Possibly......................

The user below me is The devil. 666.

false i am an angel OF DESTRUCTION

the user below me is dead
